task_summary: Pick up the red cylindrical object from the table using a robotic arm, executing all necessary grasping and lifting actions after confirming its presence.

task_long_description.overview: This episode shows a robotic arm tasked with picking up a red cylinder positioned on a table, surrounded by blue objects. The robot follows a perception–approach–grasp–lift sequence, managing visual checks, approach alignment, gentle grasping, and then lifting the object vertically. The BT includes strategies for retrying detection if the red object is not immediately visible, with tuned timeouts and grasping force reflecting a gentle pick-up. There are no explicit placement or transfer actions in this episode.
preconditions: Red cylindrical object is present on the table
Robot gripper is empty and ready
stepwise_plan: Check if the red cylinder is visible
If not visible, retry scanning up to 3 times
Detect and confirm the object's pose
Move above the red cylinder with vertical offset
Approach and align with fine tolerance
Lower gripper until contact is detected (gentle force threshold)
Close gripper gently to grasp object
success_criteria: Red cylinder is securely held in the gripper
Object lifted from the table surface
failure_and_recovery: Object not detected: retry scan up to 3 times
Failed grasp: verify stability, optionally repeat approach and grasp
task_long_description.termination: Terminate when the red cylinder is stably grasped and held above the table.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: pick up the red object from the table

node_specs.description: Checks if the red cylinder is visible in the scene.
Scans workspace for the red cylinder using grid pattern.
Detects and localizes the red cylinder.
Opens the robot gripper for approach.
Moves end effector directly above the red cylinder.
Computes a top-down grasp pose for the red cylinder.
Approaches and aligns with the cylinder using tight tolerance.
Lowers gripper until gentle contact detected.
Closes the gripper gently to grasp.
Raises gripped object vertically from the table.

failure_modes: Object not detected in initial view
Scan fails to locate object after 3 attempts
recovery_strategy: Retry scan procedure up to allowed attempts
Adjust approach and grip parameters if grasp fails
assumptions: The red object is mapped to red_cylinder based on frames; no evidence of placement or transfer in this episode.
Instruction requests pick-and-place, but visual evidence shows only pick/lift. Placement and transfer omitted per observed frames.
Auxiliary blue squares are not manipulated.

expected_success_criteria: Red cylinder fully lifted and held by gripper
